eventsFunctionsExtensions.author: ayushraj1024
eventsFunctionsExtensions.description: This extension lets you create fade in and fade out effects in your scenes when you start your scene and when you are exiting your scenes respectively.
eventsFunctionsExtensions.name: MusicManager
eventsFunctionsExtensions.shortDescription: Manage background music for your game

eventsFunctions.description: Use this extension to manage music fade in, fade out and mute in your scenes
